sys_update_xml.name: sys_security_acl_633277d8c39332107779554d0501313e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><applies_to/><condition/><controlled_by_refs/><decision_type>allow</decision_type><description/><local_or_existing>Existing</local_or_existing><name>x_884051_securit_0_u_sensitive_request</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script><![CDATA[(function(){
	if(gs.hasRole('x_<ns>_hr_sec_lite.admin')|| gs.hasRole('x_<ns>_hr_sec_lite.agent'))
	return true;

	var me = gs.getUserID();
	return (current.u_owner == me || current.u_requested_for == me);
})();]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-02-22 18:52:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>633277d8c39332107779554d0501313e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_884051_securit_0_u_sensitive_request</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Security Hardening Lite" source="x_884051_securit_0">67d2abd8c31332107779554d050131f8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Security Hardening Lite">67d2abd8c31332107779554d050131f8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_633277d8c39332107779554d0501313e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-02-22 18:52:58</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_security_acl_8394a3dcc31332107779554d050131f4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><applies_to/><condition/><controlled_by_refs/><decision_type>allow</decision_type><description>Allow write for records in x_884051_securit_0_u_sensitive_request, for users with role x_884051_securit_0.admin, and if the ACL script returns true.</description><local_or_existing>Existing</local_or_existing><name>x_884051_securit_0_u_sensitive_request</name><operation display_value="write">write</operation><script><![CDATA[(function() {
    if (gs.hasRole('x_<ns>_hr_sec_lite.admin') || gs.hasRole('x_<ns>_hr_sec_lite.agent'))
        return true;

    var me = gs.getUserID();
    if (current.u_status == 'closed') return false;
    return (current.u_owner == me || current.u_requested_for == me);


})();]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-02-22 17:42:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>8394a3dcc31332107779554d050131f4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_884051_securit_0_u_sensitive_request</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Security Hardening Lite" source="x_884051_securit_0">67d2abd8c31332107779554d050131f8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Security Hardening Lite">67d2abd8c31332107779554d050131f8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_8394a3dcc31332107779554d050131f4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-02-24 22:03:19</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_1b87b2c1c3db32107779554d05013169
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>HRREQ  set owner defaults</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    if (!current.u_owner)
        current.u_owner = gs.getUserID();
    if (!current.u_requested_for)
        current.u_requested_for = gs.getUserID();
    if (!current.u_status)
        current.u_status = 'New';

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-02-24 22:39:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1b87b2c1c3db32107779554d05013169</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>HRREQ  set owner defaults</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Security Hardening Lite" source="x_884051_securit_0">67d2abd8c31332107779554d050131f8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Security Hardening Lite">67d2abd8c31332107779554d050131f8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_1b87b2c1c3db32107779554d05013169</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-02-24 22:39:59</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1b87b2c1c3db32107779554d05013169"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_f1b108b1c35332107779554d05013151
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Hr Confidential Request API</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

        try {
            if (!(gs.hasRole('x_<ns>_hr_sec_lite.agent') || gs.hasRole('x_<ns>_hr_sec_lite.admin'))) {
                response.setStatus(403);
                response.setBody({
                    error: 'In Order to access you should have Admin/agent role requried'
                });
                return;
            }

            var body = request.body.data || {};

            if (!body.title) {
                response.setStatus(403);
                response.setBody({
                    error: 'title is requried'
                });
                return;
            }
            var gr = GlideRecord('x_<scope>_u_hr_conf_request');
            gr.initilize();
            gr.u_title = body.title;
            gr.u_description = body.description || '';
            gr.owner = body.owner || gs.getUserID();
            gr.u_requested_for = body.requested_for || gs.getUserID();

            if (body.ssn_last4 && gs.hasRole('x_<ns>_hr_sec_lite.admin')) {
                gr.u_ssn_last4 = body.ssn_last4;
            }

            var sysId = gr.insert();

            response.setStatus(201);
            response.setBody({
                message: 'Created',
                sys_id: sysId,
                number: gr.getValue('sys_id')
            });

        } catch (e) {
            response.setStatus(500);
            response.setBody({
                error: e.message
            });
        }
    }
)(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_884051_securit_0/hr_conf_req_api/create</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/create</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-02-26 17:03:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>f1b108b1c35332107779554d05013151</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Hr Confidential Request API</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Security Hardening Lite" source="x_884051_securit_0">67d2abd8c31332107779554d050131f8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Security Hardening Lite">67d2abd8c31332107779554d050131f8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_f1b108b1c35332107779554d05013151</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-02-26 17:30:50</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="HR Confidential Request API">ee614c71c35332107779554d050131f1</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
